meanings.definition: Used as a greeting or to attract someone's attention.
meanings.sent2: I said hi to my friend when I saw her at the park.
meanings.sent3: Hi there! Can you pass me the salt, please?
meanings.sent4: The sun said hi to the flowers as it rose in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful hi from the children brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: An informal way of saying hello.
meanings.sent1: She gave me a friendly hi as she walked by.
meanings.sent2: I always give a hi to my neighbors when I see them outside.
meanings.sent3: The hi from the cat made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The hi of the waves against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: His hi was so warm and welcoming, it made me feel at home.
